description: Holistic rubric for polished, revised short stories

levels.4: Opening is compelling, establishes voice, and creates immediate engagement
levels.3: Opening is strong and draws reader in
levels.2: Opening is adequate but not distinctive
levels.1: Opening is weak or fails to engage

feedback_stems.strength: Your opening immediately pulled me in with
feedback_stems.growth: Craft your first line to be irresistible—make it impossible not to read on

levels.4: Characters are vivid, complex, and change meaningfully
levels.3: Characters are well-developed with clear arcs
levels.2: Characters are present but somewhat flat or static

feedback_stems.strength: Your characters felt real and complex, particularly
feedback_stems.growth: Deepen characterization through specific details and meaningful change

levels.4: Plot is compelling with expert pacing; every scene earns its place
levels.3: Plot is strong with effective pacing
levels.2: Plot works but has pacing issues or unnecessary scenes
levels.1: Plot is confusing, thin, or poorly paced

feedback_stems.strength: Your plot moved with expert pacing, especially
feedback_stems.growth: Examine each scene—does it earn its place? Could the story be tighter?

levels.4: Prose is polished, purposeful, and pleasurable to read
levels.2: Prose is serviceable but lacks distinction
levels.1: Prose has significant issues affecting readability

feedback_stems.strength: Your prose was a pleasure to read, particularly
feedback_stems.growth: Polish sentence-level writing; read aloud to catch awkward rhythms

levels.4: Ending resonates; feels both surprising and inevitable
levels.2: Ending is adequate but doesn't linger
levels.1: Ending is weak, rushed, or unsatisfying

feedback_stems.strength: Your ending resonated—it felt both surprising and inevitable
feedback_stems.growth: Craft an ending that will linger with readers after they finish

levels.4: Work shows clear evidence of thoughtful revision and polish
levels.2: Work shows some revision but could use more polish
levels.1: Work reads like a first draft

feedback_stems.strength: The polish of revision shows throughout
feedback_stems.growth: Revise again—the best stories go through many drafts
